short_term: Xavier has begun his college journey with an introduction to Computer Science, expressing initial struggles with coursework.

tech_driven.description: Xavier encounters an opportunity to work on a blockchain project as part of a class assignment.

character_driven.description: Xavier faces a dilemma between pursuing a lucrative internship or staying true to his passion for blockchain technology.

upcoming_trends: The rise of decentralized finance (DeFi) and its implications for traditional finance.
societal_shifts: Increased integration of blockchain in everyday transactions, leading to shifts in privacy concerns and financial systems.
tech_driven_plot_points: Xavier explores the potential of $XVI in creating a new form of digital identity, leading to discussions on privacy and security.
